summary: Automates the acquisition and preprocessing of the HiFiTTS speech dataset for text‑to‑speech model training. It downloads the archive from a fixed URL, extracts its contents, parses audio files and their corresponding transcriptions, and reorganizes the data into a clean, standardized structure and metadata format ready for downstream training pipelines.
business_intent: Streamlines and standardizes the setup of high‑quality speech data for TTS development, minimizing manual effort and ensuring reproducible, consistent dataset preparation for machine‑learning teams.
